title: An Act to exclude Chapter 115 payments to veterans from gross household income calculation

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Hawkins of Attleboro, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3849) of James K. Hawkins relative to excluding certain health care cost payments to veterans from the gross household income calculation.  Veterans and Federal Affairs.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Veterans and Federal Affairs

related_entities.name: committee on Veterans and Federal Affairs

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/28/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2

Hearing rescheduled to 10/28/2025 from 01:00 PM-01:10 PM in A-2                                                                                                                                                                        and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
